text:
If you want to learn more about induction, a good resource is the free textbook Mathematics for Computer Science available on MIT Opencourseware:  <https://ocw.mit.edu/courses/electrical-engineering-and-computer-science/6-042j-mathematics-for-computer-science-spring-2015/readings/>. Chapter 5 is on induction, and chapter 1 provides a more general introduction to proofs.

For a more basic explanation that includes practice problems with solutions: <https://www.mathsisfun.com/algebra/mathematical-induction.html>

attachments.title: Readings | Mathematics for Computer Science | Electrical Engineering and Computer Science | MIT OpenCourseWare
attachments.text: This section provides courseware and readings for each session of the course, and the full course textbook.

attachments.text: Math explained in easy language, plus puzzles, games, quizzes, worksheets and a forum. For K-12 kids, teachers and parents.
